channel.title: Typescript on Savindu Shehan
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on Savindu Shehan

item.title: What is Typescript?
item.description: In this article, I will explain. what is typescript? Why do we need typescript for software development as a developer? And also what are the benefits of typescript? As of today, Javascript is a programming language that is indispensable for web development. Previously, Javascript is used for front-end web development. But, with the release of nodejs in 2009. We could use javascript for the backend. Now, Javascript is a full-stack programming language.
